author: kfogel
msg: * tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py (METADATA_DB): That's "tuple" not "list".

author: cmpilato
msg: More Subversion book work.  This time, we take on Chapter 5!
* doc/book/TODO:
Remove the relevant TODOs.
* doc/book/book/ch05.xml
Rework some parts of this chapter.  Add a new "Berkeley DB" section
under "Repository Basics", add a placeholder for "svndumpfilter"
documentation, and do a bunch of other juggling around of stuffs.
* doc/book/book/ch09.xml
Tracking a moving xref across the plains of Rohan.

author: kfogel
msg: Make a cvs2svn test skip instead of crashing when locale can't be set.
This involved adding a "SKIP" result to the main test framework.
* tools/cvs2svn/run-tests.py
(nonascii_filenames): Raise svntest.Skip when locale can't be set.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svntest/__init__.py
(Skip): New base class for skip exceptions.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/svntest/testcase.py
(TestCase.run): Handle new Skip exception.
(_Predicate.run_text): Print "PASS", "FAIL", or "SKIP" based on error.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix cvs2svn test cleanup problem introduced in r8634:
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(pass5): Delete live reference to db before removing its file.

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix a problem with cvs2svn.py introduced by r8587 that caused lots of
extra copies when creating tags and branches. The problem is in the
function SymbolicNameTracker.cleanup_entries, which was added in r8587
tries to remove sub-components that are not copied using the optimal
revision.
If the parent has an optimal range of revs N-M, N is selected as the
best rev. The child has another optimal range I-J. If the intervals
overlap for revision N, i.e. I < N and J >= N, then N is an optimal
revision for the parent as well as the child. The problem is that
SymbolicNameTracker.cleanup_entries simply compares N and I, which is
too strict. This patch verifies that N is inside the child's optimal
interval using the new function SymbolicNameTracker.is_best_rev.
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py:
(SymbolicNameTracker.is_best_rev): New function.
(SymbolicNameTracker.cleanup_entries): Add a limit_rev arg.  Use
is_best_rev when filtering out components.
(SymbolicNameTracker.copy_descend): Supply dumper.revision to
cleanup_entries.
* tools/cvs2svn/run-tests.py:
(simple_tags): Update the rev numbers to match the updated
cvs2svn.py. It is now the same as before r8587 (modulo another
unrelated change that has happened since then).
